concept.title: Why do I need to reset my IU Guest account password?

conbody.p: If you use a to log into IU services (e.g., parents who use OneStart to pay bursar bills, non-IU students accessing Oncourse CL sites for audited classes), you may receive a message requesting that you reset your Guest password. This is a legitimate request from UITS; it is not a phishing attempt. This step is necessary because of improvements made to the internal management of Guest accounts.
You will need to reset your password before you can authenticate to . If you know your old Guest password, you can reset your password at:
Alternatively, or if you do not know your password, you can use the Forgot My Password tool, which will send a one-time PIN to the email address associated with your Guest account. This tool is at:
If you have problems changing or resetting your password, contact your campus .

p.note: SC can look up Guest information in AMS Admin. From there, you will be able to send or resend the Guest activation PIN.
